name: 3D Pets in the Maze
description:
3D Pets in the maze
In this game you will help sweet to pets go through many labyrinths in the picturesque locations. Just depends on your ability to cope with the task you or not and whether a cute cat or dog to reach the goal.

Beautiful 3D mazes through which you have to spend for pets, will gradually become more and more by checking out your strength.

Going through the maze you will open new locations and receive a coin for which can open new characters.

We believe that helping pupils to pass 3D maze more interesting challenge than just roll the ball in the 3D maze. After rolling the ball in the maze you can not pricked how cute he washes or sleeping, cats and dogs do better :-) So you make the right choice by starting to play for Mike Farley, not to roll the ball in the maze.

Features:
- Nice 3D graphics
- Generated mazes - each passage of the maze will be unique
- Various game locations
- Different types of control
- Cute game characters, everyone can find a pet for the soul

Merry traveling friends!
